timeline.bodyText: IntRangeUtil? This class is an odd one :P
timeline.author: modmuss50

replies.bodyText: The other one has like tick time range, this one is like return a second time range
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: I called it IntRangeFactory, but all 3 of the suggested names could be improved. SecondRange maybe?
replies.author: SuperCoder7979

replies.bodyText: Renamed it to Durations
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Most likely TimeLimitedTask then, halting a parent task based on an arbitrary time limit in addition. similar to ConditionalTask (class_4820), which also adds an extra condition on task running.
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: Renamed to TimeLimitedTask
replies.author: liach

replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: I think it could be shortened to findNearestWarpedFungi. The fact that hoglins need to see the fungi (and can't, for example, smell it) is just an implementation detail which can go in a comment.
timeline.author: Runemoro

replies.bodyText: Mojang call the sensor "nearest visible warped fungi", but your name is better.
replies.author: liach

timeline.bodyText: What does "idle" mean? Shouldn't the idle task be the one that doesn't have the walkSpeed parameter (which you named AdmireItemTask)?
timeline.author: Runemoro

replies.bodyText: Renamed to WanderWithOffHandItemTask.
replies.author: liach

replies.bodyText: This checks if hoglins outnumber piglins, and will make hoglins fight back if true
